<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>263ceb57-5a32-42c1-9124-ad8cb8b5811d#1#9</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A keringési rendszer</string>
            <string language="en">The circulatory system</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das zirkulierende System</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le système circulatoire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O sistema circulatório</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il sistema circolatorio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το κυκλοφοριακό σύστημα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El sistema circulatorio</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az ember keingési rendszere - a vér, az érhálózat és a szív; a keringési rendszer egészsége</string>
            <string language="en">Human's circulatory system - blood, venous network and the heart, health of the circulatory system</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">vérkeringés,  keringési rendszer,  szív,  érhálózat,  vér,  </string>
            <string language="en">blood circulation, circulatory system, heart, venous network, blood</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zirkulierendes System des Menschen - Blut, 
venöses Netz und das Innere, Gesundheit des zirkulierenden Systems</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le système circulatoire de l'humain - sang, 
réseau veineux et le coeur, santé du système circulatoire</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sistema circulatório do ser humano - sangue, rede
venous e o coração, saúde do sistema circulatório</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sistema circolatorio dell'essere umano - anima, 
rete venosa ed il cuore, salute del sistema circolatorio</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κυκλοφοριακό σύστημα ανθρώπου - αίμα, φλεβικό δίκτυο
και η καρδιά, υγεία του κυκλοφοριακού συστήματος</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sistema circulatorio del ser humano - sangre, red 
venosa y el corazón, salud del sistema circulatorio</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Blutzirkulation, zirkulierendes System, Inneres, 
venöses Netz, Blut</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">circulation de sang, système circulatoire, coeur, 
réseau veineux, sang</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">circulação do sangue, sistema circulatório, 
coração, rede venous, sangue</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">circolazione di anima, sistema circolatorio, cuore, rete
venosa, anima</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κυκλοφορία αίματος, κυκλοφοριακό σύστημα, καρδιά, φλεβικό 
δίκτυο, αίμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">circulación de la sangre, sistema circulatorio, 
corazón, red venosa, sangre</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

          </typicalAgeRange>

        <rights>

          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

        </lifeCycle>

        org:Sulinet

    </metadata>
  </description>
